examples: an affirming smile and approving nod

definitions.definition: Accepting of same-sex /same-gender sexual relationships – or, more broadly, the gender identities , sexual orientations , and sexual relationships of LGBTQ people – on the same terms as those of cisgender , heterosexual people.
